selectedVerses.text: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, the city that kills the prophets and stones those who are sent to it! How often would I have gathered your children together as a hen gathers her brood under her wings, and you would not!
They will put you out of the synagogues. Indeed, the hour is coming when whoever kills you will think he is offering service to God.
And the people answered him in the same way, "So shall it be done to the man who kills him."
then you shall select cities to be cities of refuge for you, that the manslayer who kills any person without intent may flee there.
Whoever kills an animal shall make it good, and whoever kills a person shall be put to death.
